ORIGAM Documentation : String Library

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Feb 06, 2019

String Library allows full localization of the model in different languages. Error messages and other texts can be defined and stored there.

Usage

The String library is used in the following places:

  • GetString XSLT function
  • Sequential Workflow Action - ConfirmationMessage attribute
